nodes.text: Kallie Lintra was a female Resistance pilot and sister of Tallissan Lintra. Her sister hailed from the planet Pippip 3 and lived on a farm alongside her parents. Both Kallie and her sister Tallissan were part of the Resistance, a paramilitary group led by former New Republic senator Leia Organa.

In 35 ABY, Kallie Lintra participated in the battle against the Final Order, a fleet assembled by the Sith Eternal cult, on the planet of Exegol in the Unknown Regions. Lintra piloted an RZ-2 A-wing interceptor during the battle and was part of the air strike team tasked with protecting the Resistance ground forces. Shortly before the arrival of the citizens' fleet, Lintra engaged eight TIE fighters that were surrounding her A-wing starfighter, managing to destroy three of them before she was killed. After witnessing Lintra's death, General Poe Dameron mourned the loss and recalled that they had lost both Kallie and her sister Tallie during the war against the First Order.
Kallie Lintra appeared in the 2020 junior novelization for the 2019 movie Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, written by Michael Kogge.
